greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Tribonacci convolution triangle.
comment: First column is A000073(n+2). Row sums are A077939. Diagonal sums are A002478.
formula: for n >= 0 and 0< = m< = n and T'(n, m) = 0 otherwise. (End)
T(n,k) = sum(binomial(i+k,k)trinomial(i,n-k-i),i=0..n-k), where trinomial(n,k) are the trinomial coefficients (A027907) [Emanuele Munarini, Mar 15 2011]
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 16 2005
